bug.author: rkooo567
bug.summary: [GCS Actor Management] Dashboard still renders ALIVE state when actors are DEAD
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
It happens only when gcs actor management is on.
When actors are killed, the dashboard doesn't update the actor state to DEAD.
<denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): This is just for tracking. I will work on this issue.
